DoorOpenAlert.Name: Door Open Alert
DoorOpenAlert.Description: Your refrigerator knows if the door has been left open for more than 5 minutes. You can set your preferred alert notification in Preferences.

MaxCool.Name: Max Cool
MaxCool.Description: Your refrigerator will let you know when Max Cool starts and stops.

MaxIce.Name: Max Ice
MaxIce.Description: Your refrigerator will let you know when Max Ice starts and stops.

OverTemp.Name: Over Temperature Alert
OverTemp.Description: You will receive an alert when the temperature inside the refrigerator is warmer than the selected temperature for an extended period of time.

PreventativeMaintenanceAirFilter.Name: Air Filter Alert
PreventativeMaintenanceAirFilter.Description: It’s time to check the status of the air filter or produce preserver.

WaterFilter.Name: Water Filter
WaterFilter.Description: Your refrigerator will let you know when it's time to order and replace the water filter.
